howToGetQuote.question: How to get a free quote?
howToGetQuote.answer: You can get a free quote by filling out our contact form, by calling us directly or by sending us an email. We will respond within 24 business hours.

areas.question: What geographical areas do you cover?
areas.answer: We operate mainly in French-speaking Switzerland. For more distant projects, don't hesitate to contact us to discuss your situation.

responseTimes.question: What are your response times?
responseTimes.answer: For emergencies (locksmithing, electricity), we generally respond within the hour. For construction or renovation projects, timeframes depend on the scope of the work and are defined when the quote is established.

standards.question: Do you comply with Swiss standards and certifications?
standards.answer: Yes, all our work is carried out in strict compliance with current Swiss standards. Our team is trained and certified to work in all the areas we offer, thus guaranteeing quality work that complies with legal requirements.
